root.name: libraryEvent()
root.description:
The libraryEvent() method is implemented by the sketch to receive notifications from libraries. It is implemented in a similar way as keyPressed() and other callback methods.
All libraries use the same libraryEvent() method to report back to the sketch. You must check the library object to know where the event is coming from.

parameter.label: library
parameter.description: Object: the library sending the event

parameter.label: event
parameter.description: int: a number representing the type of event, depends upon the library

parameter.label: data
parameter.description: Object: additional data for the event
